place_of_publication.place_in_publication: 13: 53, plate 17, fig. 2, plates 18, 19, plate 83, fig. 3, plate 92, fig. 1. 1902

bio:treatment.discussion: Very little is known about Yucca tenuistyla, and further study is needed. Along with Y. louisianensis, it was treated by S. D. McKelvey (1938â€“1947) as a part of Y. constricta. The characteristics separating these three taxa are tenuous, and it is possible that Y. tenuistyla is just a variant of Y. flaccida, which includes Y. louisianensis.
